data.title: Early A Main Undercut Peek
data.description: Use this easy, yet powerful Undercut to set up an aggressive fight towards A Main early into the round.

data.title: Early Dish Undercut Peek
data.description: Early into the round, throw your Undercut towards Dish to contest with an advantage.

data.title: Start Round B Main Undercut
data.description: At the start of the round, throw your Undercut towards B Main like so, for an advantageous fight. You can also combo with your teammates utility for an early pick.
